content: {"name": "Grand Central Food Program, Staten Island Ferry Terminal", "alternate_name": "", "description": "\"For a smoother experience, this is a grab-and-go meal site where trucks arrive sometimes earlier or later due to traffic. We recommend arriving 15 minutes before the scheduled time. If the truck is running late, please allow at least 15 minutes from the scheduled arrival time before inquiring.\"", "email": "", "url": "https://www.coalitionforthehomeless.org/our-programs/food/grand-central-food-program/grand-central-food-program-routes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4 Whitehall St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10004", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7011133, "longitude": -74.012936}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 776-2000", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Mobile soup kitchen truck"}]}
